DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two dos immunoselected , culture-expanded , nucleated , allogeneic adult MPCs combine hyaluronic acid two control intradiscal injection subject chronic low back pain due moderate Degenerative Disc Disease ( DDD ) one lumbar level L1 S1 . All investigational subject study undergo injection either 6 million ( M ) 18M cell hyaluronic acid carrier degenerate lumbar disc 's nucleus pulposus . All control subject undergo intradiscal control injection either saline hyaluronic acid
DOC.brief_title: Safety Preliminary Efficacy Study Mesenchymal Precursor Cells ( MPCs ) Subjects With Lumbar Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , multicenter , double blind , control clinical study compare two dos immunoselected , culture-expanded , nucleated , allogeneic adult MPCs combine hyaluronic acid two control intradiscal injection subject chronic low back pain ( > 6 month ) due moderate DDD one lumbar level L1 S1 unresponsive conservative therapy least 3 month ( include physical therapy ) . After screen injection visit , subject evaluate clinically radiographically 30 day , 3 , 6 , 12 , 24 36 month injection . Subjects evaluate time point safety .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female least 18 year age . 2 . Have ability understand requirement study , provide write informed consent , comply study protocol . 3 . Have ability understand provide write authorization use disclosure personal health information ( PHI ) [ per Health Insurance Portability Accountability Act ( HIPAA ) privacy rule US ] . 4 . Have chronic low back pain least 6 month . 5 . Have document symptomatic diagnosis DDD one level L1S1 determine change disc hydration MRI compare normal disc without annular fissure contain disc herniation . 6 . Have fail 3 month nonoperative low back pain management . 7 . Disc height loss < 30 % compare normal adjacent disc base upon radiographic evaluation . 8 . Pretreatment baseline low back pain least 40 mm 100 mm visual analog scale . 9 . Low back pain great leg pain . 10 . Pretreatment baseline Oswestry Disability Index Questionnaire score least 30 100point questionnaire . 1 . Female subject pregnant nursing , woman plan become pregnant first year ( 12 month ) follow surgery . 2 . Have current prior history within last 3 year neoplasm ( exclude basal cell carcinoma ) and/or active neoplasm within last 24 month , prior screen . 3 . Patients compressive pathology due stenosis frankly herniated disc sequester discs candidate . 4 . Intact disc bulge/protrusion focal herniation symptomatic level ( ) > 3 mm presence disc extrusion sequestration . 5 . Lumbar spondylitis undifferentiated spondyloarthropathy . 6 . Have undergone previous surgery involve level . 7 . Any lumbar intradiscal injection procedure ( e.g. , injection corticosteroid , methylene blue , dextrose , glucosamine chondroitin sulfate ) . Discography may perform , must do least 2 week prior MPC injection procedure . 8 . Have acute fracture spine time enrollment study . 9 . Have history epidural steroid injection within 1 week prior study treatment . 10 . Have know history hypersensitivity anaphylactic reaction murine bovine product dimethyl sulfoxide ( DMSO ) . 11 . Have positive screen human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) antibody . 12 . Have know history hypersensitivity anaphylactic reaction Hyaluronan . 13 . Have current prior history within last 3 year neoplasm ( exclude basal cell carcinoma ) and/or active neoplasm within last 24 month , prior screen . 14 . Have recipient prior stem cell/progenitor cell therapy biological intervention repair target intervertebral disc . 15 . Are transient treat last 6 month enrollment alcohol and/or drug abuse inpatient substance abuse program . 16 . Currently incarcerate ( prisoner ) .
